input.sentences: hundreds of people showed up to support their loved ones at the graduation .
the students sat waiting patiently for their named to be called .
beaming with pride | the students accepted their degrees .
one by one each student said a silent `` congrats | '' to all those up on stage .
after the graduation | loved ones could n't wait to gather and take photos to the new graduates .
output.sentences: Everyone was watching on Graduation Day.
I could see some of the professors whispering as his name was called.
Regardless, he took his diploma with pride and shook the Dean's hand firmly.
Everyone in his graduating class smiled at his accomplisments.
The celebration that followed was very heart-warming.
